text: Juan Rodolfo Laise (22 February 1926 - 22 July 2019) was an Argentine Roman Catholic bishop. Rodolfo Laise was born in Argentina and was ordained to the priesthood in 1949. He was appointed titular bishop of Iomnium and coadjutor bishop of the San Luis, Argentina, in 1971. He then served as bishop of the diocese from 1971Diocese of San Luis until Pope John Paul II accepted his resignation for reasons of age on 6 June 2001. ==Notes== Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops
title: Juan Rodolfo Laise
